title: Bade Ghulam Ali Khan Saheb
overview: Ustad Bade Ghulam Ali Khan was one of the foremost musicians of Hindustani music and was regarded as the best representative of the Patiala Gharana. Possessing an uncommonly rich and mellifluous voice, his forte was Khayals and Thumris. https://archive.org/details/dni.ncaa.SNA-9-VCD
